mapper.update: CREATE TABLE public.#{tableName} ( adcode integer PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, name varchar(2048) NOT NULL, children integer, parent integer, the_geom public.geometry )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO #{tableName} (adcode, name, children, parent, the_geom) VALUES (#{adcode}, #{name}, #{children}, #{parent}, st_asgeojson(#{the_geom}))
